ingredients.content: 50 g Cheddar cheese, cut in pieces
800 g stewing steak, cut in pieces (5 cm)
fresh parsley, leaves only, for garnishing (optional)

preparations.content: Place cheese and parsley in mixing bowl then grate <b>4 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Place flour, butter, baking powder, salt and pepper in mixing bowl then mix <b>15 sec/speed 4<b>. Add milk, egg and reserved cheese mixture then knead <b>20 sec/<b>. Roll into 8 balls then divide between Varoma dish and tray. Cover with lid and set aside.

Place a bowl on mixing bowl lid and weigh in flour. Remove bowl and stir in ¼ tsp salt and ¼ tsp pepper. Add beef and toss in flour to coat. Heat oil in a large frying pan on a medium heat then brown meat on all sides.
Place onions and 1 Tbsp oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add reserved braised meat, stock cube, ½ tsp salt, ½ tsp pepper, bay leaf, thyme, water and ale then cook <b>60 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add mushrooms and carrots then place Varoma into position and simmer <b>30 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>. Serve stew immediately topped with dumplings sprinkled with parsley leaves, if desired.
